## a.url() function

A URL scalar type as defined by RFC 1738. For example, https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000NZW3KC/ or mailto:example<!-- -->@<!-- -->example.com. URLs must contain a schema (http, mailto) and can't contain two forward slashes (//) in the path part.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function url(): _Internal_ModelField<_Internal_Nullable<string>>;
```
**Returns:**

[\_Internal\_ModelField](./data-schema._internal_modelfield.md)<!-- -->&lt;[\_Internal\_Nullable](./data-schema._internal_nullable.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt;&gt;

URL field definition
